title: What's new with resin.io?
text: Get updates on new features in our weekly release notes. Last week we highlighted a significantly faster VPN and per-device API keys.

title: New board support: Raspberry Pi Zero W
text: resinOS v2.0.3 for Raspberry Pi now supports the wireless Raspberry Pi Zero.

title: Resin-in-resin: a truly embedded device
text: Resin.io helps manage devices that are hard to get toâ€”even those encased in a block of resin.

title: Work with us!
text: We are actively recruiting for a Solutions Architect, DevOps Engineer, and other roles.
